sentence: Along with Walker, they include Ohio Senate hopeful Josh Mandel, Trump White House doctor turned Texas congressional candidate Ronny Jackson, Peter Thiel-backed Arizona Senate candidate Blake Masters, Alabama gubernatorial challenger and Trump’s former ambassador to Slovenia Lynda Blanchard, and Kelly Tshibaka, who is taking on Trump target Sen. Lisa Murkowski in the Alaska Republican primary.
author: Roger Sollenberger
title: Republicans Are Still Trying to Buy Trump’s Love

sentence: PREVIOUSLY: All Fun And Games Until Ohio GOP Senate Candidate Starts Calling Opponent A 'Pussy' Last month, Republicans Josh Mandel and Mike Gibbons almost came to blows at Ohio's Senate GOP primary debate.
author: Stephen Robinson
title: Maybe We Are Better Off Without Political Debates

sentence: Although he has yet to endorse far-right candidates JD Vance or Josh Mandel, who are duking it out for the Republican nomination for Senate in Ohio, Trump's vibe is very much alive.
author: Brandon Gage
title: Donald Trump's 'troublemaking' could end up benefitting Democrats: columnist

sentence: Ohio: Josh Mandel (R) and Mike Gibbons (R) are neck and neck in a packed Republican environment.

title: NPR predicts these 10 Senate seats might see a party FLIP
